allow: Bash(venvScriptspython -c "from app.sourcing.search_config import PORTAL_CONFIGS; print\(''Enabled portals:'', [k for k,v in PORTAL_CONFIGS.items\(\) if v.enabled]\); print\(''Disabled portals:'', [k for k,v in PORTAL_CONFIGS.items\(\) if not v.enabled]\)")

Bash(venvScriptspython.exe -c "
from app.sourcing.dtvp.scraper import run_dtvp_scraper
import asyncio

projects = asyncio.run\(run_dtvp_scraper\(max_pages=2\)\)
print\(f''Gefunden: {len\(projects\)} Projekte''\)
for p in projects[:5]:
    print\(f''  - {p.title[:60]}...''\)
")
